entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
